articles.description: J.J. Perry, the director of Netflix’s new action comedy Day Shift, suggested four of his favorite movies that combine action, horror, and comedy that you can watch at home.
articles.content: Netflixs new vampire hunting movie Day Shift brings back an old classic: combining action, horror, and comedy into a fun, audience-thrilling package. It helps to have a leading man like Jamie Foxx, a… [+4247 chars]

articles.author: HT Entertainment Desk
articles.title: Alia Bhatt calls Ranbir Kapoor the light of her life in new video from babymoon - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Alia Bhatt shared an update from her babymoon with Ranbir Kapoor in Italy. She dropped a video of him dancing to the tunes of Brahmastra song Deva Deva. | Bollywood
articles.content: Alia Bhatt shared a new video from her Italian babymoon with Ranbir Kapoor. She is expecting her first child with her husband. Sonam Kapoor, who is also pregnant, celebrated her babymoon at the same … [+1688 chars]

articles.title: Amy Grant Postponing Tour Dates, As Initial Injury Reports Downplayed Severe Injury - Deadline
articles.description: Amy Grant suffered a concussion and was unconscious for ten minutes after falling during a July bike ride, according to reports. The singer announced Friday that her remaining tour dates for the summer and early fall would be postponed as a consequence. Initi…
